description.originalText: Ash is fantastic and my wife and I can't recommend her enough. We've known her for well over a year and our kids, 2 and 4, love her. She is always fully engaged when sitting our kids and even brings activities to do with them. She is wonderfully positive, always patient and kind with our kids, who can be a handful! We've also recommended her to several friends who have also had the same experience and now use her regularly. Highly recommend her no matter your kids ages and whether you need an evening sitter or someone to watch your kids over the weekend!

We have known Ashley for well over a year and cannot say enough positive things about her. She is the most engaged sitter we’ve ever had with our two kids (both under 5), always playing games and doing activities with the kids. She’s also very respectful of any parenting preferences we have with our kids. I have even recommended her to friends who need overnight weekend help or date night sitting, and they all rave about her. I would highly recommend her due to her integrity, compassionate nature, and passion for helping families and kids.
I worked alongside Ashley with a client. I love her enthusiasm and high energy. Ashley has a love for crafts and do-it-yourself projects. She would be a great asset to any family!
Ashley is a great nanny/babysitter! She always offers fun activities to do! Great experience!

description.displayText: Ashley is everything you would want in a nanny and more! She is hard working, fun, communicative, kind, energetic, loving, caring, and more. She has become an integral part of our family.  My kids are always happy to see her and she truly cares about their needs. Ashley is a safe place for my children to be themselves and express their needs. She is the only person I trust my kids with and I never worry when she is with them.  Her greatest quality is her ability to connect with my children and get on their level. My kids have even asked me to go back out when getting home due to how much fun they were having with Ashley! There is never a dull moment in our house when it comes to Ashley- she always finds creative ways to interact/engage with my kids.  She instills joy and laughter in our home. Most importantly I always know that my kids are safe, well loved, and having fun. We have had the pleasure of working with Ashley for the last few years and frankly can't imagine life without her!

description.displayText:
Ashley is a truly talented caregiver who was a natural way with kids. She did an outstanding job with our 2 children. I would encourage anyone looking for a nanny to give her a try.

While we no longer need full time nanny support, we still bring Ashley in to help from time to time. Our kids adore her, and proactively ask us when they're going to get to see her next. I also appreciated how Ashley deferred to my preferences. I was in single Dad mode while my wife was out of the country. It was a big relief to have someone like Ashley step into the family during that time in a way that harmonized with our normal family rhythm and principles. My wife was relieved that we had someone like Ashley there while she was gone. If we needed help again in the future, Ashley would be our first call!
